stimulusHtml: Which of the following changes can be made so that the code segment works as intended?

features.html:
The following method is intended to return the total number of elements in the 2D array  arr.  The method does not work as intended. 

 

public int totalElements(int[][] arr) 
{
   return arr.length * arr.length;   // Line 3
}

choicesHtml: Changing line 3 to  return arr.length + arr.length;
